price: 39. Ou auriez-vous de Nous un engagement solennel, qui (Nous impose) jusqu’au Jour de la Résurrection, de vous accorder ce que vous jugerez devoir obtenir ?
arabic: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَٰنٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am lakum aymānun ʿalaynā bālighatun ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati inna lakum lamā taḥkumūna
